title: Apply Stress Management Techniques
brief: Use specific psychological techniques to maintain calm focus and prevent panic in survival situations.
steps: Step 1: Practice relaxation skills regularly - deep breathing, muscle relaxation, or meditation.
Step 2: Develop time management skills to prioritize survival tasks effectively.
Step 3: Build assertiveness skills to make clear decisions under pressure.
Step 4: Practice cognitive restructuring - consciously control how you view and interpret situations.
Step 5: Remember that survival is about 'refusing to give up' rather than just enduring.
warnings: Unmanaged stress can lead to panic, poor decision-making, and potentially fatal mistakes.
People under extreme stress may make irrational choices if not psychologically prepared.
